welcome_message: Please log in or sign up with your email or social media account.
language_message:
Please select your preferred language.
You may change it later from the settings.
password_requirement_desc:
Please enter your password and log in.
Please tap Forgot Password? and reset your password.
password_requirement_one: 8 to 32 alphanumeric characters (At least 1 upper case)
password_signup_desc: You don't have an account with us just yet. Please sign up by creating a password for your account.
password_not_match: Your password must match the previous entry. Please check again.
